文档节点.标题: DocReLM: Mastering Document Retrieval with Language Model
文档节点.摘要: This work introduces DocReLM, a Document Retrieval system enhanced with Language Models to address challenges in academic document retrieval. The system utilizes LLMs to generate high-quality training data, enhance retriever and reranker models, and extract references from retrieved papers. DocReLM achieves significant improvements over existing systems, with a Top 10 accuracy of 44.12% in computer vision compared to Google Scholar's 15.69%, and 36.21% in quantum physics compared to Google Scholar's 12.96%.

作者节点.所属机构: Shanghai Artificial Intelligence Laboratory; Fudan University
Shanghai Artificial Intelligence Laboratory; Harbin Institute of Technology

RAG组件节点.描述: Uses an LLM to build a graph-based text index by deriving an entity knowledge graph from source documents and pre-generating community summaries for groups of closely-related entities.
Retrieves relevant community summaries based on the user query using cosine similarity between document and query embeddings.
Uses a cross-encoder to rerank the retrieved passages by processing inputs consisting of a concatenated sequence of the query string and candidate passage.
Uses a Large Language Model to read the retrieved passages and extract the best references cited in the passage.

RAG流程节点.描述: A document retrieval system enhanced with Language Models, combining a neural dense retriever, a reranking mechanism, and a novel reference extraction component.
